overview: Dr. Tzony Siegal is the founder of NLT SPINE and the inventor of its core non-linear technology. He is the author of pioneering articles on the pathophysiology (laboratory) and the surgical treatment of metastatic spinal cord compression and recipient of the SRS and HSS prizes for best R&D presentations. He authors numerous patents and contributes to the novelty pipeline of the company. Dr. Siegal holds two Medical Doctorate Degrees from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, (Israel),, has obtained his Orthopedic Surgery education at the Sheba Medical Center (Israel ) and had a two years fellowship at the Hospital for Special Surgery, NYC, NY, (USA).
